Class PiePlot.PiePlotLegend

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.graphics.AbstractDrawable
      • de.erichseifert.gral.graphics.DrawableContainer

            • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.legends.ValueLegend
              • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.PiePlot.PiePlotLegend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataListener, Container, Drawable, Legend, LegendSymbolRenderer, SettingsListener, SettingsStorage, Serializable, Iterable<Drawable>
    Enclosing class:
    PiePlot

    public static class PiePlot.PiePlotLegend
extends ValueLegend
    A legend implementation for pie plots that displays items for each data value of a data source.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
